statements: SELECT * FROM PlantGeneticData;
SELECT species_name, genetic_sequence FROM PlantGeneticData;
SELECT * FROM PlantGeneticData WHERE chromosome_number > 10;
SELECT species_name, chromosome_number FROM PlantGeneticData WHERE genetic_sequence LIKE '%ACGT%';
SELECT species_id, species_name FROM PlantGeneticData ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT species_name, genetic_sequence FROM PlantGeneticData WHERE chromosome_number = 2;
SELECT * FROM PlantGeneticData WHERE species_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT species_id, chromosome_number, species_name FROM PlantGeneticData WHERE chromosome_number < 5 ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT species_id, chromosome_number FROM PlantGeneticData WHERE species_name = 'Rose' OR species_name = 'Tulip';
SELECT species_id, genetic_sequence FROM PlantGeneticData WHERE species_name = 'Sunflower' AND chromosome_number > 2 ORDER BY chromosome_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM PlantSpecies;
SELECT species_name, common_name FROM PlantSpecies WHERE plant_family = 'Rosaceae';
SELECT scientific_name FROM PlantSpecies WHERE species_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM GeneticData WHERE mutation_type = 'Insertion';
SELECT gene_name, gene_sequence FROM GeneticData WHERE species_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM PlantSpecies WHERE species_id = 1;
SELECT species_name, scientific_name FROM PlantSpecies WHERE common_name = 'Rose';
SELECT * FROM PlantSpecies ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT common_name, COUNT(*) AS total_plants FROM PlantSpecies GROUP BY common_name;
SELECT ps.species_name, gd.gene_name FROM PlantSpecies ps JOIN GeneticData gd ON ps.species_id = gd.species_id;
SELECT * FROM plants;
SELECT scientific_name, common_name FROM plants WHERE family_name = 'Rosaceae';
SELECT gene_name, gene_sequence FROM genes;
SELECT p.common_name, m.mutation_type FROM plants p INNER JOIN genes g ON p.plant_id = g.plant_id INNER JOIN mutations m ON g.gene_id = m.gene_id;
SELECT mutation_type, mutation_details FROM mutations WHERE mutation_type = 'insertion';
SELECT * FROM mutations;
SELECT plant_id, scientific_name, common_name FROM plants WHERE family_name='Rosaceae';
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, gene_sequence, plant_id FROM genes WHERE gene_name LIKE '%ABC%';
SELECT mutation_id, mutation_type, mutation_details, gene_id FROM mutations WHERE mutation_type='insertion';
SELECT plant_id, scientific_name, common_name, family_name FROM plants ORDER BY scientific_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM plant_species;
SELECT species_name, genus_name FROM plant_species ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT gene_name FROM gene_sequences WHERE sequence LIKE '%ATCG%';
SELECT DISTINCT researcher_name FROM researchers;
SELECT experiment_id, result FROM experiments WHERE result = 'success';
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT species_name, genus_name FROM plant_species ORDER BY genus_name DESC;
SELECT gene_name, sequence FROM gene_sequences WHERE species_id = 2;
SELECT experiment_id, result FROM experiments JOIN researchers ON experiments.researcher_id = researchers.researcher_id;
SELECT * FROM plant_species WHERE family_name = 'Rosaceae';
SELECT * FROM PlantSpecies;
SELECT species_name, species_description FROM PlantSpecies ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GeneSequences WHERE species_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT gene_sequence FROM GeneSequences WHERE species_id = 2 ORDER BY gene_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM PlantSpecies;
SELECT species_name, species_description FROM PlantSpecies WHERE species_id = 1;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM Researchers ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT study_name, study_description FROM ResearchStudies WHERE study_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT r.researcher_name, s.study_name FROM Researchers r JOIN StudyResults sr ON r.researcher_id = sr.researcher_id JOIN ResearchStudies s ON sr.study_id = s.study_id;
